unicorns.name: Robot Unicorn Bad-Boy Unicorn of Unicornness Supreme
unicorns.description: Some call him Lemat-Nunnicor, disillusioned from the once pretty magical unicorn, now evil unicorn supreme. His tongues cannot be sated, his eyeballs tentacles of eletric destruction. His mane, a plasma sticken torch of evil shadowy-ness-ness.!

unicorns.name: Unicorn
unicorns.description: Laugh or I will get sad
